snippet.title: Billy Saves the World - Gameplay Overview [4K]
snippet.description:
WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1390420/Billy_Saves_the_World/

Join the DISCORD: https://discord.gg/FTjN4JMWhn

Billy Saves the World is a narrative-driven platformer that lets you choose between action or adventure.
